casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Travis Demonz BOONE. No. 516P06. Supreme Court of North Carolina. October 5, 2006. Daniel P. O'Brien, Assistant Attorney General, Valerie M. Asbell, District Attorney, for State of NC.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 21st day of September 2006 by Defendant for Petition for Discretionary Review Under G.S. 7A-31:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference this the 5th day of October 2006."
